prompt: Text your group chat about what happened at lunch today using Gen-Alpha slang and emojis. Keep it short (50-100 words max).
response: Nahhh y’all 😭💀 lunch today was WILD. Bro tried to rizz up the lunch lady for extra fries and got absolutely COOKED 💅🔥. Then Jay spilled choccy milk on his drip and pretended it was “aesthetic” 😭✨. Meanwhile, I’m just minding my biz when the cafeteria erupts—someone started a “skibidi” chant and the teachers were like 🧍‍♂️🧍‍♀️. Whole vibe was chaotic, but lowkey a W day 😂🤝.
